DOC.brief_summary: A Multi-Center Double-masked Study Safety Efficacy Travoprost APS Compared TRAVATAN Patients Open-angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Travoprost APS Versus TRAVATAN
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old , either gender race . Open Angle Glaucoma ( OAG ) Ocular Hypertension ( OHT ) . Not currently IOPlowering medication currently stable treatment ( i.e , least 30 day ) IOPlowering monotherapy . All patient : Mean IOP eye ( Eligibility 1 & 2 Visits ) : ≥ 24 ≤ 36 mmHg 9 AM ; ≥ 21 ≤ 36 mmHg 11 AM & 4 PM . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Females childbearing potential meeting condition set protocol . Severe central visual field loss . Angle Shaffer grade < 2 . Cup/disc ratio > 0.8 ( horizontal vertical measurement ) . Best correct visual acuity ( VA ) score bad 55 ETDRS letter read ( equivalent approximately 20/80 Snellen 0.25 decimal ) . Intraocular surgery trauma within last 6 month . Any abnormality prevent reliable applanation tonometry . History current ocular pathology ( include severe dry eye ) would affect conduct study . Allergy/hypersensitivity study medication . Unable discontinue use IOPlowering medication minimum washout period 5 28 day prior Eligibility Visit . Less 30 day stable dose regimen medication use chronic basis may affect IOP . Use additional topical systemic ocular hypotensive medication study . Therapy another investigational agent within 30 day prior Screening visit . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
